title: random possible improvements to champions
body:
{{champion:27}} Maybe give him a skillshot taunt (like an Ahri charm) that forces enemies to chase him. That way he can provide easier utility in team fights.

{{champion:1}} Make her Molten Shield do AoE damage over time.

{{champion:75}} In a Veigar-esque manner, Q'ing enemies should grant Nasus stacks, which should grant him bonus AD for better DPS in the midgame.

{{champion:30}} Have his ult do percent missing health damage.

{{champion:41}} Allow him to give oranges to allies.

What do you think?

replies.body: The Nasus idea is cool. there's no reason to pick him over Illaoi or Darius

Permanent, free, stacking ad would be absolutely broken though.  Even if it was just 1 AD per Q kill, it is perfectly common to see Nasus with >100 stacks on his Q.  100 AD is 2 BF Swords and 2 long swords.
Hmmm. 600 AD Nasuss going full tank would be pretty broken.
make it 0.75 AD per kill then, like Thresh souls
absolutely not to all of these

No
No (She does enough damage)
Hell no (1 permanent AD is way more powerful than 1 permanent AP per stack)
No
No (Riot doesn't want ally cleanse as an ability, more item active.  Also could turn him a bit too supporty)
